io.seanbailey.adapter

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.seanbailey.adapter.Adapter

  • public class Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for converting Java to SQL and back again.
    Since:
    2018-05-14
    See Also:
    SQLChain

    • Method Detail

      • createModel

        public static Model createModel(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> clazz,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributes,
                                java.sql.ResultSet results)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                SQLAdapterException
        Uses reflection to create a new model. Then populates it's contents with the current result in the result set.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to instantiate.
        attributes - An array of all attributes.
        results - A Result Set.
        Returns:
        A new model. Created with reflection.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        SQLAdapterException
        Since:
        2018-05-14

      • getAttributesFromResults

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributesFromResults(java.sql.ResultSet results)
                                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a list of attributes from a result set.
        Parameters:
        results - Result Set.
        Returns:
        A list of attributes.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        2018-05-14

      • getAttributesFromModel

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAttributesFromModel(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> clazz)
        Uses reflection to retrieve a list of all attributes from a model. Any field that is annotated as excluded will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Model class to retrieve columns from.
        Returns:
        A list of all SQL columns.
        Since:
        2018-05-14
        See Also:
        Excluded

      • getAttributesFromInstance

        public static <T extends Model> java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAttributesFromInstance(T model,
                                                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> attributes)
                                                                                    throws SQLAdapterException
        Retrieves all attribute values from a model, according to a list of attributes. Useful for prepared statements.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to retrieve values from.
        attributes - A list of attributes.
        Returns:
        A list of objects, found at each corresponding field.
        Throws:
        SQLAdapterException - if the model cannot be mapped to SQL for some reason.
        Since:
        2018-05-14
        See Also:
        #getAttributeFromInstance(T, String)

      • getAttributeFromInstance

        public static <T extends Model> java.lang.Object getAttributeFromInstance(T model,
                                                                          java.lang.String attribute)
                                                                   throws SQLAdapterException
        Uses reflection to retrieve a model's attribute.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to retrieve values from.
        attribute - Attribute to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Corresponding attribute value.
        Throws:
        SQLAdapterException - if the model cannot be mapped to SQL for some reason.
        Since:
        2018-05-14
        See Also:
        #getAttributesFromInstance(T, List)

      • setAttribute

        public static <T extends Model> void setAttribute(T model,
                                                  java.lang.String attribute,
                                                  java.lang.Object value)
                                           throws SQLAdapterException
        Uses reflection to set a model's attribute.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to update.
        attribute - Attribute to set.
        value - Value to set.
        Throws:
        SQLAdapterException - if the model cannot be mapped to SQL for some reason.
        Since:
        2018-05-14

      • getPrimaryKey

        public static java.lang.String getPrimaryKey(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> clazz)
                                      throws SQLAdapterException
        Returns the annotated primary key from the given model.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Model to search for primary key in.
        Returns:
        The name of the primary key attribute.
        Throws:
        SQLAdapterException - if the class does not have a primary key.
        Since:
        2018-05-14
